alert.note: Alert for Barnstable; Eastern Essex; Eastern Norfolk; Eastern Plymouth; Nantucket; Suffolk (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Coastal Flood Statement issued August 01 at 2:30PM EDT until August 02 at 2:00AM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD STATEMENT REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 10 PM THIS EVENING TO 2 AM EDT WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Up to one half foot of inundation above ground level expected in low-lying areas near shorelines and tidal waterways (3.4 to 12.9 feet Mean Lower Low Water). * WHERE...Eastern Massachusetts coast including Cape Cod and Nantucket. * WHEN...From 10 PM this evening to 2 AM EDT Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Some water on the most vulnerable shore roads and property. This includes a portion of Morrissey Boulevard in Boston and possibly East Street on Nantucket. && Time of high total tides are approximate to the nearest hour.
